eventDecorators.name: ExecutedWithFail
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when admins mapping is modified.

eventDecorators.name: ExecutedWithSuccess
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when admins mapping is modified.

functionDecorators.name: executeOperation
functionDecorators.description: Executes an operation after receiving the flash-borrowed assets. Ensure that the contract can return the debt + premium, e.g., has enough funds to repay and has approved the Pool to pull the total amount.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the flash-borrowed assets.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The amounts of the flash-borrowed assets.

parameterDecorators.name: premiums
parameterDecorators.description: The fee of each flash-borrowed asset.

parameterDecorators.name: initiator
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the flashloan initiator.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The byte-encoded params passed when initiating the flashloan.

returnDecorators.description: True if the execution of the operation succeds, false otherwise.
